name: Lansdowne Technologies, Inc.
description: Operator of an online logistics platform intended to provide international shipping. The company offers a web-based platform, as well as a Chrome extension, enabling users to purchase from Amazon internationally and get delivered to their doorstep.
one_liner: Operator of an online logistics platform intended to provide international shipping. The company offers a web-based platform, as well as a Chrome extension, enabling users to purchase from Amazon internationally and get delivered to their doorstep.
